website_summaries.verdict: Save money on trips to the barber without paying an especially high amount for clippers with this inexpensive yet practical Braun model.
pros: Makes achieving professional-looking results possible thanks to the 9 easy-to-use settings for trimming hair to various lengths
cons: Only comes with a 2-pin plug, so you'll need to purchase a 3-pin adapter
Getting a full charge on the battery can take several hours

customer_reviews.title: Promising but failed to deliver
customer_reviews.text: It was promising. Braun makes good mixers... My Philips 5000 fell apart, people rate them high but the blades will come loose from shaft...anyway. This looks good, nice blue comb and comfy to hold. And that’s only good at it. If you cut 3mm which is shortest, comb touching the clipper face and is all good. Retract the comb away and all good is gone. The material they used for comb is so flexible it gives on gentle touch. What does it mean? On 9 mm setting i was cutting anything between 6-9mm having patchy finish. Unusable bad choice of material, not happy with retractable mechanism either, is not as good as on other brands. Bad bad product
customer_reviews.author: PATRIK

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS WELL! donno what all the bad reviews are about!
customer_reviews.text: Okay.. firstly, this is my pair of quarantine clippers. And I have thick hair.. it clips through it no problem. And it being cordless makes it easier. This is a good clipper. Durability? I dont know. But so far. I'm happy with it. No bias though.. only one cut in..so far so good. So just get it. Lolz
customer_reviews.author: Dr.jee

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers, work really well and give a close accurate cut.
customer_reviews.text: These were bought to replace a really ancient pair of clippers that had finally packed in. They work well and give a nice even cut but I especially like the fact that length setting is factored into the body of the clipper, rather than there being loads plastic guards to break and lose. The only downside would be the lack of a storage bag or case coming with the clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Basic .....
customer_reviews.text: Not great, battery discharges itself so you need to charge it for a few hours before you use it. If you just want a number 3, 6, 9 etc all over its ok, if you want to get a hair “style” buy something else
customer_reviews.author: David Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Cuts hair well, power adaptor concerns
customer_reviews.text: Have just received this and it cut my hair quite well, setting 12, the battery still had plenty of oomph left after 15 minutes. Cocerned that the power adaptor and connector is a special design. Why couldn't they have used a standard DC coax plug? The adaptor is 5.9v 600ma. The connector is unlikely to stay in place if trying to use the clipper in 'corded' manner because it doesn't have a retaining clip.. The cable is 1.1 metre. The photo shows a standard UK shaver plug next the braun adaptor, the adaptor is a loose fit in a uk shaver socket.
customer_reviews.author: etwallace

customer_reviews.title: Smooth if you do not use the length regulator
customer_reviews.text: Only downside is the adjustable bit for the length of the hair, I find the hairclippers with multiple bits for the sizes much more effective
customer_reviews.author: Design-id

customer_reviews.title: Intuitive to use.
customer_reviews.text: I've never cut my husbands hair before and this was simple to use & gave excellent results. If you are a novice and looking for something that isn't going to gouge out chunks of hair & has a smooth finish then I would thoroughly recommend this one! The quality of design & manufacture is also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working just fine so far and do enjoy no cable around my face when trimming
customer_reviews.author: Edita Busmiene

customer_reviews.title: Great first cut!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well on the first use! Did a good job of cutting and was easy to use. It was charged on arrival so that was a bonus! Top tip, you’ll need a 2 pin plug converter to charge in 3 pin UK plugs unless you have the bathroom mirror plug set up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: we had a mains-powered one before and was slightly worried about the power given battery-based, but was actually full size and is cutting hair well; much lower noise level as well; doesn't use add-ons to create the distance but a slider, a bit fiddly but you get used to it quickly, just don't press up or down when cutting; can't comment on battery duration as still on the first charge after 5 sessions; the blades are metal not ceramic so needs regular oiling (comes with a small bottle of oil which looks like it'll last a year or so)
customer_reviews.author: Donald Duck

customer_reviews.title: This arrived with an EU plug!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, although purchased on Amazon.co.uk it arrived with an EU plug so unable to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms H

customer_reviews.title: Good product at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to sort out my "lockdown hair" and it was a perfect choice. To be honest don't think I'll be back at my hairdresser's anytime soon! I managed to get my haircut done 3 times on one full charge, which is quite good. The comb guide has few lengths marked but I guess everyone must find the best setting themselves, so if you're careful and don't rush you'll be happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Domster

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Thursday evening, arrived at lunch time Friday - and that was with free (non-Prime) delivery! Clipper was charged when I took it out of the box, so I immediately set about giving myself a haircut - the first I've had since late February (I was just thinking about going in mid-March when everything closed down). Tremendously easy to use, and did the job perfectly. I now feel several percent more human than I did when I woke up this morning. Highly recommended if you need something to tidy yourself up a bit while the barbers are closed!
customer_reviews.author: C Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: It arrived fully charged and ready to go. I read the instructions, checked out a video on YouTube and was ready for action. It was easy to use, quite light in the hand but had no trouble with thick, curly hair. Easy to adjust the settings to do hair. One hair cut later you have two happy customers, very easy to use. Cannot comment on battery life
customer_reviews.author: MgtLindsay

customer_reviews.title: Must have adapter - can't just replace plug
customer_reviews.text: Product seems good, I badly needed my first covid haircut so I guess that predisposed me to be positive towards it. It came charged up, which is fortunate, because it has a two prong European plug which cannot be replaced. I normally just replace 2 prong plugs with a 3 prong, but in this instance the plug is integrated into the dc transformer, so it can't be replaced. Most of my travel adapters obviously change eu - 3 prong plugs, but I do have one multi adapter in a suitcase somewhere which i will have to dig out before the next haricut.
customer_reviews.author: Antoine M.

customer_reviews.title: A good hair clippers -
customer_reviews.text: My Phillips hair trimmers packed in after about 10 years use, so I tried this Braun model. I find it to be much easier to handle being a little smaller and the blades run at a faster rate and they feel more accurate. lives up to the Braun name of good quality and reliablity.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Only comes with a European 2 pin plug.
customer_reviews.text: Uk buyers beware; only comes with a European 2 pin plug!
customer_reviews.author: M.Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for all types of home hair cuts
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only used once so far, but very happy. It costs slightly more than other clippers but I think it's great. 1. the guard device allows to cut up to 2.4 cm, which is great if you need guards but don't want to go too short 2. it can go cordless 3. very nice design. It comes with a European plug, but you can use it in shavers sockets usually fitted in bathrooms. I managed to get a pretty decent hair cut on my own, with fades. Made me feel confident that I was not accidentally cutting under the guard or that the guard was going to move if I gently pressed the clippers against my head.
customer_reviews.author: Michela

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The hair clippers were easy to operate, despite never having used anything like this before. I was initially worried about what the end result would be like, but was pleasantly surprised at the outcome. Believe me if I can use them, then anyone can.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fab item, no more barber trips for us
customer_reviews.text: This was the 2nd best buy in lockdown. The first being our mini convertible lol. These have been a life saver for hair cuts for my husband and son. Since lockdown has been lifted we have continued our at home barber as they've been so impressed. So happy with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Instrall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use even if a novice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - untrained home hairdresser - have used to cut sons and husband’s hair, you need to work out Braun ‘scale’ relative to ‘a grade 4’ but easy to convert. Battery lasts really well and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Surreymum

customer_reviews.title: Should save me a ton long-term!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during lockdown (as I am sure loads of people did!) and gave myself a haircut. It's very easy to use and the results aren't too bad. Obviously it probably won't give you the same cut as a barber could, but if you want something easy this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK IN THE UK
customer_reviews.text: For some reason people seem to think that they can sell foreign items in the UK with the wrong attachments on. Unless you have a converter don't bother buying this. It will not plug into a UK plug socket. Such a shame that sellers cant be genuine and make this clear on the listing. Makes you suspicious about everything else that is on the listing. AVOID THIS SELLER AND THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: simon2ooo

customer_reviews.title: Lockdown Haircut
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the performance and quality. Cut smoothly and easily. I started on 21 and went down to 15 for a classic short back and sides. Easy to clean and no need to change attachments. Would recommend for self lockdown haircuts
customer_reviews.author: Namster

customer_reviews.title: It's A Hair Clipper
customer_reviews.text: This clipper seems OK after one use. I don't see how I can give it a proper review after such a short time but so far so good. Hopefully I'll never have to go to the hairdresser's ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Osborne

customer_reviews.title: easy to use for lockdown haircuts!
customer_reviews.text: great clippers for the amature barber. lots of blade settings which really made it easier to get a fade effect....rather than having to do same number all over. husband and son looking great again within minutes of clippers arriving!
customer_reviews.author: madellq

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust length of haircut with just the one comb. Battery easily lasts for 2 haircuts but item can also be used whilst attached to mains power
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good clippers.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this because of the integral comb that can cut to grades 1-8 without needing separate guards. Works well, is easy to use and comfortable to hold. Battery life is fine.
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for this price
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately doesn’t fit to me . Only can cut 3,6,9... so it’s not really useful. Also has weak cutting performance for some types of hair
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cut my husbands hair during lockdown, have used it twice and it appears excellent so much so that my husband says he is not going back to the barbershop!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers for a first time user!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut my husband's hair during lockdown. They are great, easy to use and lightweight. They have lots of different length settings too so we got a bit creative with the haircut and it ended up looking fabulous! I've been hired as the new barber, but I think the clippers deserve the credit.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, make sure you know what you’re doing or do your research before using it! Product is great! Good not to have all the attachments in different places!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good middle of the road
customer_reviews.text: Used it for cutting hair. Seems nice and sharp and doesn't seem to have any issues cutting hair. Doesn't feel as beefy as a hairdresser's one but fine for cutting hair at home
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and I look smarter in lockdown
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the box charged it and used it first time easily doing a good job. Didn’t snag like previous clippers I have had and was smoothly adjustable. Cleaned easily too. Just make sure you have the right plug to charge it as it comes with the two pins like your electric razor used to.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hengeveld

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It was very hard to find a clip during the lock down, and finally got hold of this clip and very happy with the product. Powerful and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for a lock down haircut
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for a lockdown haircut . Excellent quality . Cuts very well for different hair lengths
customer_reviews.author: Qush

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: First time I’ve used hair clippers. It proved to be easy and I’m very pleased with the result on my husbands hair.
customer_reviews.author: kittytwo

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers for a novice!
customer_reviews.text: I've never cut men's hair before and I did pretty well with these, aided by a very good American Youtube video. I and my partner (who uses clippers regularly for his beard) thought they were really good. Top marks Braun, as ever!
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: first home haircut
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my first attempt at a home haircut. Convenient slider to change the length so fewer pieces to lose before I need it again.
customer_reviews.author: ts9783

customer_reviews.title: A lockdown essential
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a coronavirus buzz and it was perfect. Never need to go to the hairdressers again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great clipper but EU 2 pin plug
customer_reviews.text: Great clippers but came with EU two pin plug. Desperate for a haircut so can't send back, had to go out and buy an adaptor!
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyscotsman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault the product. Simple to use and does a good enough job during these days of non existent barber appointments.
customer_reviews.author: L@Ran1

customer_reviews.title: Dose exactly what it should
customer_reviews.text: Delighted to get it and it does the job very well ,No complaints at all 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed. Easy to use and hold. Cut my hair well from quite long to pay short. Build quality feels good. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nick farley

customer_reviews.title: Braun top of range clippers
customer_reviews.text: Had my first hair cut this week, this must be one of the very best cutters i have ever used. Highly reconmended
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Hardiman

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers !
customer_reviews.text: great clippers - easy to use and my son and I were both pleased with our super smart short hair cuts !
customer_reviews.author: Casarnbil,

customer_reviews.title: Not for curly Afro Caribbean hair.
customer_reviews.text: Useless for Afro hair. Design of comb means curls just just get tangled until clipper gets stuck and hair gets jammed on the inside of comb. Probably ok for straight hair but useless to me for intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: JAO

customer_reviews.title: No UK plug
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for UK. Only European 2 pin plug provided
customer_reviews.author: Sinead

customer_reviews.title: the length of the cut
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant , very easy to use , managed to cut husband hair with very little trauma
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading.
customer_reviews.text: The product didn't come with a UK charger... Delivery took 2 weeks for a product (in stock in UK and ultimately delivered from Germany)
customer_reviews.author: Philippe FEZANS

customer_reviews.title: worked fine, no problems.
customer_reviews.text: Decent clippers. Paid double what they are worth but needs must.
customer_reviews.author: django

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use,and self contained.
customer_reviews.text: The length settings with one sliding guard is brilliant idea
customer_reviews.author: richard chester

customer_reviews.title: Simple length adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to adjust length of cut. Well balanced clipper but lacks carry pouch. Battery life untested - used twice only to date.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Best thing about this. It only have one level adjusting tool. Very cool
customer_reviews.author: Ladoucefleur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect remedy for a lockdown mop
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my lockdown haircut and proved a worthwhile purchase. They are very easy to use with an excellent battery life 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for family haircuts
customer_reviews.text: Great item, bought to cut my husband and son’s hair during lockdown. Do not understand the negative reviews at all. Easy and comfortable to use, great even cut. Great value. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: jwald81

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent product with rapid change of cutting length without changing heads
customer_reviews.author: mrs c m matthews

customer_reviews.title: Buzz
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Hair cut for first time. Helps to be ambidexteros.
customer_reviews.author: JOP

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use ,great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Delighted ! My first time at cutting my husbands hair, very good results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use , great results.
customer_reviews.text: This product was great to use on my teen son's hair especially since I'm now a self taught barber as well under these trying times. No changing of fittings, all in one easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ak

customer_reviews.title: Very well made clippers
customer_reviews.text: Clippers cut hair very well and are extremely easy to use. No minus points.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Easy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Managed to do a stylish haircut to my son)
customer_reviews.author: Balaussa A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for home, would be lost without these
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service, great product for a beginner / home haircut. 1st time ever cutting hair good result. Would recommend for anyone especially parents or families or teenagers to use.
customer_reviews.author: CLARE P

customer_reviews.title: Great device make sure you have a plug adaptor.
customer_reviews.text: Only real complaint is it has a two prong plug, so you'll need an adaptor if you live in the UK to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: John Timperley

customer_reviews.title: The hair clipper was delivered with a continental cable
customer_reviews.text: The hair clipper looks great but it came with a continental cable for the charger, which is of little use on this island... Would be good if it came with the appropriate cable.
customer_reviews.author: jbg

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant to use. Long time delivery but kept in loop
customer_reviews.author: Della Eales

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for African hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to cut my kids' hair with this. Failed. It can't cope with African hair. Works fine with European hair, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good clipper easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it, using number 12 for top and number 6 for side (at the barber 5 and 3) cut smooth and easy. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: A.G

customer_reviews.title: Not fitted with a three pin plug
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with a euro three pin plug on it !! Cost me another €11 to order a three pin converter plug for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product . Saves a lot of money Instead of going to hairdressers. Very easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Inconsiderate
customer_reviews.text: Disliked it because it didn’t have a UK plug to go into!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reed

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Great product just a shame my partner isn’t so appreciative. Maybe it’s to do with my skills as a barber!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: The hair clipper saves you on average £10 at the hairdressers
customer_reviews.text: The hair clipper is very good and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Barry Darling

customer_reviews.title: Brill
customer_reviews.text: Works well gives a good hair cut , very pleased, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Willetts

customer_reviews.title: Item received and collected
customer_reviews.text: Just letting you know that I did collect this item and I am pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Mrs P Mallon

product_meta.title: Braun HC5010 Hair Clipper in 9 Settings
feature_bullets: Would you like to have the best line of beauty treatments in your home with good quality products at a great price?
Well don't go without Hair Clippers Braun HC5010 40 min! Braun HC5010

Colour of product: Black. Maximum hair length: 2.4 cm, Minimum hair length: 3 mm. Operating time: 40 min, Charging time: 8 h, Battery technology: Nickel-Metal Hydride (NiMH). Width: 5.6 cm, Depth: 15.4 cm, Height: 22 cm

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
